Package stockmarketsim

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuySellEvent
    Used to handle buying and selling events that happen throughout the year
    Client
    Represents a Client in a Stock Market Simulation.
    Company
    A class for holding data about individual companies, can be used on exchanges.
    Exchange
    An exchange in which companies of a certain type are traded
    ExtEvent
    An event which effects the simulation at some point in time
    IntelligentTrader
    A trader which attempts to make a profit on the market, rather than by randomly buying and selling
    MarketIO
    Is used to load all simulation initialization data from a .csv file
    MarketSnapshot
    Stores a snapshot of the data in the market at a specific time
    Offer
    Represents an offer made by a Trader to purchase or sell Stocks.
    Portfolio
    Class to represent a clients portfolio of owned assets.
    RandomTrader
    An implementation of a random trader, designed to emulate the random noise in a stock market
    Simulation
    Handles the stock market simulation
    Stock
    Represents a collection of stocks.
    StockMarket
    A stock market for holding exchanges and traders
    Trader
    Trader type is for simulated traders such as intelligent or random traders
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ExchangeType
    The type of exchanges there are
    MarketState
    The possible states a market can be in
